title: Seconds of
content:
Hello,

I have been working on a website project the last 6 months. Now when the release is here, I feel it´s not a day to late to get some input on the typographic and visual aspect of it. I feel that this is the right forum for it.  
I can write a lot about this site... the name and branding, the concept, the dynamic layout solution, the typographic presentation, flash vs. non-flash etc. But basically it´s about one thing, presenting an overview of relevant news and articles, easy and pleasent.

feel free to give me some input on the visual aspect of this. Especially on the typography.

[http://secondsof.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016211557/http:/secondsof.com/ "http://secondsof.com/")

Thank you.  
Patrik

(One issue that I am aware of and working on is the file-size/loading... this is not becasue of the flash files ;) but of the RSS/atom- feeds size.)
author: castenbladh
